mutants.code:
def calculate_final_scores(test_cases):
    results = []
    MOD = 1000000008
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, powers) = case
        p = 2 ** (N - 1)
        x = 0
        for power in powers:
            x = x | power
        final_score = x * p % MOD
        results.append(final_score)
    return results
